title: Scream The TV Series S01E09 720p HDTV 2CH HEVC x265 piemonster
description:
Source - Scream.The.TV.Series.S01E09.720p.HDTV.x264-KILLERS.mkv

How to play H.265/HEVC/x265

If you want to play this smoothly, you need to use a device/PC with at least dual-core processor. You have to update your player to latest version. Also if you use your PC to watch it, installing LAV Filter will help you a lot if you want to use KMPlayer or PotPlayer. However, MPC-HC (preferably in K-Lite Media Codec Pack) is the recommended. Many updated players have native support for the codec. To play on Android, use MX Player.

If you want to hit and run that's your prerogative I don't mind, but please buy more bacon! Support the bacon industry
